content.raw: It looks like the 2.2 prelease changes Imu orientation to use the Gazebo computed values instead of computing them in the AtlasPlugin code. But looking at ImuSensor.cc in gazebo, this transform has the same problem of finding orientation of B relative to starting orientation A: written B x A.inverse() instead of the correct A.inverse() x B.
